Name: Renova
About the game: Delve into harrowing dungeons, scour long-forgotten ruins from ancient realms, and battle legendary foes. The world of Renova beckons knightly heroes to come forth and vanquish its evil - the time is Nye! Overview Renova is a tactical Action-RPG that seeks to provide an innovative experience in gameplay and visual style. A refreshing take on the Action-RPG genre, we introduce a tactical combat system, robust multiplayer modes, and nostalgic fantasy aesthetic. Game Features Chief among the gameâ€™s unique attributes is the Per Frame Combat System . This system segments all player actions, such as attacking, defending, moving and spell-casting, into 1 to 3 second time frames. Players must be wary of how to time their strikes, what decisions to make next, and how to properly predict enemy moves. Distinguished from any run-of-the-mill hack and slash combat, this is the combat that challenges the player, demanding one to be fully immersed and aware of the actions. The world of Renova has depth and expanse. We have a passion to bring it to life and to offer the players a remarkable experience. We look forward to you venturing the world of Renova with us!
